docTitle.titlePart:
Title:
LS on further enhancements for CELL_FACH

front.note:
Response to:
Release:
Rel-11
Work Item:
Cell_FACH_enh-Core
Source:
TSG RAN WG2
To:
TSG RAN WG1
Cc:
Contact Person:
Name:
front.div:
1. Overall Description:
RAN#51 agreed on the work item description "Further enhancements for CELL_FACH" (RP-110436). The
objectives of the WID are to identify whether the gains justify the complexity for each of the sub-features listed
in the WID over existing mechanisms, and specify those for which this is shown to be the case.
RAN2 acknowledges that some of the sub-features listed in the WID may impact RAN1. In particular, based on
high level discussions, RAN2 has identified the following sub-features that are more in the RAN1 domain of
expertise:
 Downlink related improvements of resource utilization, throughput, latency and coverage
o Stand-alone HS-DPCCH without ongoing E-DCH transmission
 Uplink related improvements of resource utilization, throughput, latency and coverage
o TTI alignment between CELL_FACH UEs and CELL_DCH UEs
o Reduction in timing of the initial access in the physical random access procedure
o Signaling based interference control
In order to progress the work on these sub-features, RAN2 kindly requests RAN1 group to start the technical
evaluation of the sub-features listed above and convey their findings on the gain and complexity tradeoff back
to RAN2. RAN2 will continue to evaluate and provide further guidance if necessary.
